<h3 id="X38121">X(38121) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(7), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-2*(b+c)*a^5+2*(b^2+7*b*c+c^2)*a^4-2*(b+c)*(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a^3-(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+4*(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38121) = X(3)+2*X(2550) = 2*X(5)+X(35514) = X(7)+2*X(5690) = X(8)+2*X(31657) = 4*X(10)-X(5779) = 2*X(40)+X(31671) = 4*X(140)-X(390) = 4*X(142)-X(1482) = 3*X(5054)-2*X(38031) = 3*X(5790)-2*X(38154) = 3*X(26446)-2*X(38130) = 2*X(38030)-3*X(38065) = X(38036)-3*X(38052) = 2*X(38036)-3*X(38107) = 3*X(38052)-2*X(38172) = 3*X(38065)-4*X(38123) = 3*X(38066)-2*X(38126) = 3*X(38092)-X(38149) = 3*X(38092)-2*X(38170) = 3*X(38107)-4*X(38172)</b>
<p>X(38121) lies on these lines: {2,38043}, {3,1602}, {5,35514}, {7,5690}, {8,31657}, {10,5779}, {30,38092}, {40,31671}, {140,390}, {142,1482}, {381,516}, {443,8158}, {511,38185}, {515,38201}, {517,38036}, {519,38030}, {527,38066}, {528,5054}, {952,21151}, {971,5790}, {1001,3526}, {1656,3826}, {1657,11495}, {2829,9708}, {2951,18480}, {3059,34339}, {3174,37615}, {3617,36996}, {3925,6244}, {4312,9654}, {5055,38037}, {5450,31494}, {5603,38171}, {5657,5762}, {5686,5843}, {5732,18525}, {5789,37560}, {5805,12702}, {5817,38042}, {5840,38202}, {5844,11038}, {5845,38116}, {5846,38115}, {5850,38127}, {5851,38128}, {5852,38129}, {5853,10246}, {5854,38124}, {5855,38125}, {5886,38204}, {6173,34718}, {8148,20330}, {8236,38028}, {9669,31423}, {9956,11372}, {10156,24392}, {10247,38053}, {10427,19914}, {10531,16855}, {10827,31391}, {12573,37545}, {17532,21168}, {18357,36991}, {19855,31777}, {19875,38179}, {20119,33814}, {24475,34784}, {28194,38151}, {28212,38137}, {28234,38054}</p>
<p>
X(38121) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5603, 38171), (5686, 38112), (5790, 38200), (5817, 38042), (5886, 38204), (8236, 38028), (10246, 38122), (10247, 38053), (11038, 38111), (38030, 38123), (38036, 38172), (38107, 38052), (38149, 38170)<br>
X(38121) = anticomplement of X(38043)<br>
X(38121) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38030, 38123, 38065), (38036, 38052, 38172), (38036, 38172, 38107), (38092, 38149, 38170)<br>
</p>
